result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Shane Coyle was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Failure to Support, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.22(3).
  • Failure to Support, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.22(3).
  • Failure to Support, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.22(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent.    In the event that the defendant is discharged from probation with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent SHALL notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment SHALL be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

miscConds.notes: Defendant is to comply with any treatment/programming as deemed appropriate by the COMPAS assessment and agent.    Defendant shall provide a DNA sample.  Defendant is to pay child support obligations.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael Shane Coyle

William Nemer for the State, def appeared in person with his attorney Carly Sebion.  Renee Lyon also present from Child Support Agency.  Amended Information filed, def entered plea on counts 1, 2 and 3, Court finds Def guilty of counts 1, 2 and 3, def sentenced.
William Nemer for the State; Def appeared in person w/atty Carly Sebion.  PLEAS set.  Bond cont.

William Nemer for the State; Def appeared in person w/atty Carly Sebion.  Atty Sebion requesting additional STC.  No objection by State.  STC set.  Bond cont.

William Nemer for the State; Def appeared in person w/atty Carly Sebion.  Def wishes to waive right to PH.  Waiver form filed.  Court advised Def of right to PH.  Def KVI waives right to PH.  Court finds Def KVI waives right to PH.  Court finds probable cause felony committed and binds over for further proceedings.  Information filed.  Proceeds to arraignment.  Atty Sebion states Def waives reading of Information and enters NG plea.  PTC/STC set.  Bond cont.  Atty Sebion's motion to dismiss reserved.

Pre-trial conference at 03-30-2015 10:00 am.
Status Conference at 04-16-2015 09:00 am.

William Nemer for the State; Def appeared in person w/o counsel.  Mix up with PH date.  Def willing to waive time limits for PH.  Court advised Def of rights.  Def KVI waives time limits for PH.  Court finds Def KVI waives time limits for PH.  PH set.  Bond cont.

Defendant, Michael Shane Coyle, appeared.  William Patric Nemer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Court advised Defendant of his rights, Preliminary Hearing date set, bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 25, 2015 at 11:45 am.
